participant_1.background:
I work fulltime in a shipyard.
I volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue.
I donate a part of my salary to charity each month.
I am ex military.

participant_2.background:
I am high maintenance.
I love listening to britney spears.
I like to tan in tanning beds.
I love spending money.
I diet a lot.

content.text: Hi there! What do you do for a living?
I'm a student at the moment, but I'm hoping to get into fashion design.
That's awesome! I used to be in the Navy, but now I work in a shipyard.
That's so cool! I've always been interested in the military, but I'm not sure if I have what it takes.
It's definitely not for everyone, but it was a great experience for me.
I'm glad to hear that! What's your favorite part about your job?
I love working with my hands and building things. I also enjoy the challenge of working on a team to complete a project.
That sounds really rewarding! I'm sure you're very good at your job.
Thank you! I'm trying to be the best I can be.
I'm sure you are! What's your favorite thing to do in your free time?
I like to spend time with my family and friends, and I also enjoy volunteering my time.
That's great! I love to spend time with my friends and family too. I also like to go shopping and tanning.
I'm not big on shopping, but I do like to go tanning sometimes.
I know what you mean! It's so relaxing.
Yeah, it is. I'm glad we have some things in common.
Me too! I think we'd be good friends.
I think so too! I'm looking forward to getting to know you better.
